member.name: T:JetBrains.Rd.Reflection.ReflectionRdActivator
member.summary:
To get maximal performance of Rd framework you should directly provide serializers to every Model and Property.
Creating models by hand with this approach is tedious and error-prone. The main idea behind is to automatically create RdExt and initialize fields and properties with appropriate serializers.

member.name: M:JetBrains.Rd.Reflection.RdExtAttribute.#ctor(System.Type)
member.summary: Mark RdExt as implementing contract from specific RdRpc interface. That means that this RdExt will be exposed by interface name, not by the type itself. It may be used when explicit marking of RdRpc is undesirable.
member.param: RdRpc interface type. Must be implemented by type, which marked by this RdExt attribute.

member.name: T:JetBrains.Rd.Reflection.RdRpcAttribute
member.summary: Mark implementing interface of RdExt by this attribute to indicate intent to use this interface for proxy generation

member.name: T:JetBrains.Rd.Reflection.RdScalarAttribute
member.summary: It has no special semantic. Used only to tell ReSharper about ImplicitUse.

member.name: M:JetBrains.Rd.Reflection.RdScalarAttribute.#ctor(System.Type)
member.summary: Provides external marshaller for this type
member.param: A type which implements for this type or any base interface. Keep in mind that if you provide an serializer for base interface a runtime casting error is possible on the receiver side if receiver want to have an inheritor from this interface

member.name: T:JetBrains.Rd.Reflection.IProxyTypeMarker
member.summary: Marker interface for proxy types. Used to distinguish between proxy-implemented methods, for which we should only initialize RdCall fields and other reactive properties and real methods in types, for which we should Bind appropriate RdEndpoint.

member.summary: Create serializer from Read and Write method without

member.name: M:JetBrains.Rd.Reflection.IScalarSerializers.GetOrCreate(System.Type)
member.summary: Return static serializers for type Static serializer is the serializer which always return provided type and never any of the inheritors. It makes sense to ask these serializers for struct, enums and sealed classes

member.name: M:JetBrains.Rd.Reflection.IScalarSerializers.GetInstanceSerializer(System.Type)
member.summary: Return instance serializers for the type. Instance means that Polymorphic types is possible, you can ask here for serializer for interface, for example

member.name: M:JetBrains.Rd.Reflection.IScalarSerializers.RegisterPolymorphicSerializer(System.Type,JetBrains.Rd.Reflection.SerializerPair)
member.summary: Register custom serializer for provided polymorphic type. It will be used instead of default . Be aware, that you can register your custom serializer only before any serializer was asked via .

members.member:
Struct, Aggregate, ImmutableList are not supported.
This enbf-like scheme can only be used to understand basic concepts and terms, there is no any strong semantics behind several leaf rules.
// RdBasic, may have inexact mapping to C# types. IType ::= IBindable | IScalar Bindable ::= NullableBindable | Array[Bindable] | ImmutableListBindable | Class
IScalar ::= NullableScalar | NonNullableScalar NullableScalar ::= Maybe[NonNullableScalar] NonNullableScalar ::= List[IScalar] | Array[IScalar] | PredefinedType | Struct
NonNullableBindable ::= Array[Bindable] | IReadOnlyList[Bindable] | Class NonNullable::= NonNullableScalar | NonNullableBindable
FieldType ::= IScalar|IType|Aggregate
RdProperty ::= RdProperty[FieldType] RdSet ::= RdSet[INonNullableScalar] RdMap ::= RdMap[INonNullableScalar, INonNullable] RdCall ::= RdCall[IScalar, IScalar] RdSignal ::= RdSignal[IScalar]
// C# declarations, [ and ] mean < >. FieldDeclaration[T] ::= C#(public readonly? T identifier) PropertyDeclaration[T] ::= C#(public T identifier { get; }) | C#(public T identifier { get; private set; }) // etc. // PropOrFieldDeclaration[T] ::= FieldDeclaration[T] || PropertyDeclaration[T] EnumDeclaration ::= C#(Enum[enum_const*]) // Not supported. No RdGenerator analogue. // StructDeclaration ::= C#(struct field* )
Member ::= RdSignal | RdProperty| RdList | RdSet | RdMap | RdModel | RdCall Declaration ::= BindableDeclaration | Struct | Enum | RdExtDeclaration BindableDeclaration ::= TopLevel | Class
MemberDeclaration ::= PropOrFieldDeclaration[Member] RdModelMemberDeclaration ::= PropOrFieldDeclaration[Member|FieldType]
RdModelDeclaration ::= C#([RdModel] class {RdModelMemberDeclaration*}) | EnumDeclaration | ValueTuple[FieldType{1,7}] RdExtDeclaration ::= C#([RdExt] class {MemberDeclaration}* )
ROOT ::= RdModelDeclaration ROOT | RdExtDeclaration ROOT | Nothing
*

member.name: F:JetBrains.Rd.Reflection.ScalarSerializer.myTypesCatalog
member.summary: Types catalog required for providing information about statically discovered types during concrete serializer construction for sake of possibility for Rd serializers to lookup real type by representing RdId

member.name: F:JetBrains.Rd.Reflection.ScalarSerializer.myStaticSerializers
member.summary: Collection static serializers (polymorphic is not possible here! Only instance serializer can be polymorphic)

member.name: F:JetBrains.Rd.Reflection.ScalarSerializer.myPolySerializers
member.summary: Collection of specific polymorphic serializers. These serializers should be register before activating any Rd entity to guarantee consistency of serializers in Rd objects

member.name: F:JetBrains.Rd.Reflection.ScalarSerializer.myPolySerializersSealed
member.summary: A flag to enforce consistency of serializers. New specific poly serializer can't be registered after first query of polymorphic serializer from outer world.

member.name: F:JetBrains.Rd.Reflection.ScalarSerializer.myBlackListChecker
member.summary:
Black listed type. Any attempt to create serializer for these types should throw exception. Used to prevent attempts to pass an object which is well-known as non-serializable. For example, any component of tree-like structure or object graph should not be passed to serializer
This predicate should return true only for blacklisted type

member.name: M:JetBrains.Rd.Reflection.ScalarSerializer.GetOrCreate(System.Type)
member.summary: Return static serializers for type

member.name: M:JetBrains.Rd.Reflection.ScalarSerializer.CreateValueTupleSerializer``1
member.summary: Register serializer for ValueTuples

member.name: M:JetBrains.Rd.Reflection.SerializerReflectionUtil.GetBindableFields(System.Reflection.TypeInfo)
member.summary: Get lists of members which take part in object serialization. Can be used for RdExt, RdModel and any RdScalar.

member.name: T:JetBrains.Rd.Reflection.SwitchingScheduler
member.summary: A special scheduler which can be globally temporarily switched to another implementation.

member.name: F:JetBrains.Rd.Reflection.SwitchingScheduler.SwitchCookie.myIsValid
member.summary: Default constructor detector
